extracted_playbook.title: Check Apache HTTP Server Version
extracted_playbook.description: Identify the current version of Apache HTTP Server installed on the system to determine if it is affected.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Apache HTTP Server version between 2.4.0 and 2.4.61?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Apache HTTP Server
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Apache HTTP Server to version 2.4.62 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.
